verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> Zophar <WH6691> the Naamathite, <WH5284> and said, <WH559>
Therefore <WH3651> do my thoughts <WH5587> cause me to answer, <WH7725> and for <WH5668> this I make haste. <WH2363>
I have heard <WH8085> the check <WH4148> of my reproach, <WH3639> and the spirit <WH7307> of my understanding <WH4480> <WH998> causeth me to answer. <WH6030>
Knowest <WH3045> thou not this <WH2063> of <WH4480> old, <WH5703> since <WH4480> man <WH120> was placed <WH7760> upon <WH5921> earth, <WH776>
That <WH3588> the triumphing <WH7445> of the wicked <WH7563> is short, <WH4480> <WH7138> and the joy <WH8057> of the hypocrite <WH2611> but for <WH5704> a moment? <WH7281>
Though <WH518> his excellency <WH7863> mount up <WH5927> to the heavens, <WH8064> and his head <WH7218> reach <WH5060> unto the clouds; <WH5645>
Yet he shall perish <WH6> forever <WH5331> like his own dung: <WH1561> they which have seen <WH7200> him shall say, <WH559> Where <WH335> is he?
He shall fly away <WH5774> as a dream, <WH2472> and shall not <WH3808> be found: <WH4672> yea, he shall be chased away <WH5074> as a vision <WH2384> of the night. <WH3915>
The eye <WH5869> also which saw <WH7805> him shall see him no <WH3808> more; <WH3254> neither <WH3808> shall his place <WH4725> any more <WH5750> behold <WH7789> him.
His children <WH1121> shall seek to please <WH7521> the poor, <WH1800> and his hands <WH3027> shall restore <WH7725> their goods. <WH202>
His bones <WH6106> are full <WH4390> of the sin of his youth, <WH5934> which shall lie down <WH7901> with <WH5973> him in <WH5921> the dust. <WH6083>
Though <WH518> wickedness <WH7451> be sweet <WH4985> in his mouth, <WH6310> though he hide <WH3582> it under <WH8478> his tongue; <WH3956>
Though he spare <WH2550> <WH5921> it, and forsake <WH5800> it not; <WH3808> but keep it still <WH4513> within <WH8432> his mouth: <WH2441>
Yet his meat <WH3899> in his bowels <WH4578> is turned, <WH2015> it is the gall <WH4846> of asps <WH6620> within <WH7130> him.
He hath swallowed down <WH1104> riches, <WH2428> and he shall vomit them up again: <WH6958> God <WH410> shall cast them out <WH3423> of <WH4480> his belly. <WH990>
He shall suck <WH3243> the poison <WH7219> of asps: <WH6620> the viper's <WH660> tongue <WH3956> shall slay <WH2026> him.
He shall not <WH408> see <WH7200> the rivers, <WH6390> the floods, <WH5104> the brooks <WH5158> of honey <WH1706> and butter. <WH2529>

That which he labored for <WH3022> shall he restore, <WH7725> and shall not <WH3808> swallow it down: <WH1104> according to his substance <WH2428> shall the restitution <WH8545> be, and he shall not <WH3808> rejoice <WH5965> therein.
Because <WH3588> he hath oppressed <WH7533> and hath forsaken <WH5800> the poor; <WH1800> because he hath violently taken away <WH1497> a house <WH1004> which he built <WH1129> not; <WH3808>
Surely <WH3588> he shall not <WH3808> feel <WH3045> quietness <WH7961> in his belly, <WH990> he shall not <WH3808> save <WH4422> of that which he desired. <WH2530>
There shall none <WH369> of his meat <WH400> be left; <WH8300> therefore <WH3651> <WH5921> shall no <WH3808> man look <WH2342> for his goods. <WH2898>
In the fullness <WH4390> of his sufficiency <WH5607> he shall be in straits: <WH3334> every <WH3605> hand <WH3027> of the wicked <WH6001> shall come <WH935> upon him.

When he <WH1961> is about to fill <WH4390> his belly, <WH990> God shall cast <WH7971> the fury <WH2740> of his wrath <WH639> upon him, and shall rain <WH4305> it upon <WH5921> him while he is eating. <WH3894>
He shall flee <WH1272> from the iron <WH1270> weapon, <WH4480> <WH5402> and the bow <WH7198> of steel <WH5154> shall strike him through. <WH2498>

It is drawn, <WH8025> and cometh out <WH3318> of the body; <WH4480> <WH1465> yea, the glittering sword <WH1300> cometh <WH1980> out of his gall: <WH4480> <WH4846> terrors <WH367> are upon <WH5921> him.

All <WH3605> darkness <WH2822> shall be hid <WH2934> in his secret places: <WH6845> a fire <WH784> not <WH3808> blown <WH5301> shall consume <WH398> him; it shall go ill <WH7489> with him that is left <WH8300> in his tabernacle. <WH168>
The heaven <WH8064> shall reveal <WH1540> his iniquity; <WH5771> and the earth <WH776> shall rise up <WH6965> against him.
The increase <WH2981> of his house <WH1004> shall depart, <WH1540> and his goods shall flow away <WH5064> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath. <WH639>
This <WH2088> is the portion <WH2506> of a wicked <WH7563> man <WH120> from God, <WH4480> <WH430> and the heritage <WH5159> appointed <WH561> unto him by God. <WH4480> <WH410>
